
# Yahoo Finance Scraper

## Install

```
npm install yahoo-finance-scraper
```

## Usage

* Import

```
const symbol = require('yahoo-finance-scraper')
```

* Get symbol

```
symbol('MSFT', '2019/01/01', '2019/01/31', '1d')
```

> Returns a promise with the result


## Result

```
{
  "timestamp": ["1230906600", ...],
  "low": [31.22, ...],
  "high": [32.10, ...],
  "open": [31.41, ...],
  "close": "[31.58, ...],
}
```
